description:
Michael Kors is always interested in hearing from talented, globally-minded individuals with a passion for fashion.
 
 
 
   If you enjoy working in a creative, fast-paced environment, then we would love to hear from you!
 
 
 
   Michael Kors is looking for enthusiastic, passionate, and dynamic stock personal to become a part of our team.
   Responsibilities include but are not limited to:
    Receiving Shipments
    Preparing transfers
    Keeping the stock room clean and tidy
    Ensuring Sales floor is fully stocked
    Helping associates retrieve merchandise from the stock room
   Qualifications:
    1-2 years of relevant retail experience
    1-2 years of retail stock management experience
   Michael Kors Canada Co. offers excellent career growth opportunities, competitive salary and comprehensive benefit package.
 
 
 
   At Capri, we are all responsible for creating a diverse and inclusive workplace. We try to inspire change and growth within each other and believe success is a result that comes from our differences. Capri is proud to be an equal opportunity employer committed to inclusivity regardless of age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic characteristics, race, color, creed, religion, ethnicity, national origin, alienage, citizenship, disability, marital status, military status, pregnancy, or any other legally-recognized protected basis prohibited by applicable law. M/D/F/V
